Title: Mazel-Tina
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Holly Schlesinger, Mike Benner (staff writer)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: A series of mishaps leave Tina the center of attention at a classmate's Bat Mitzvah she wasn't invited to.
